message: Bob, I'm offering you this incredible product at a price of $1800000. It's a fantastic opportunity, and I believe the value it holds for you will make this a worthwhile investment. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $1200000 is my absolute minimum, I'm willing to come down to $1500000 to make this deal happen. Let's find a middle ground. What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1300000. Can you consider this price?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  I'm willing to go down to $1400000. This is a significant compromise for me, but I truly believe this product will be worth it to you. Let's finalize this deal!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'll offer $1250000. Can you consider this price?
